definitions.definition: A tract of land in which the dead are buried .
A final storage place for collections of things that are no longer useful or useable .

subdefinitions.definition: The discard pile , in some trading card games.
A team where players are sent when they are not useful, or a team where players become useless if sent there.

definitions.definition: A period very early in the morning in which there is very little activity .
examples: graveyard shift , graveyard slot , graveyard watch

definitions.definition: Synonym of suicide ( “ beverage combining all available flavors at a soda fountain ” ) .

main_definition: A tract of land in which the dead are buried .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , by extension ) A final storage place for collections of things that are no longer useful or useable .
( attributively ) A period very early in the morning in which there is very little activity .
( US , slang ) Synonym of suicide ( “ beverage combining all available flavors at a soda fountain ” ) .
